entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 03:43 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.6°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -24.6°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
